content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the object in february while looking at another object in the eastern sky. i had been trying to take pictures as i told my niece that there were a lot of ufos in the sky. as i was watching this object in the eastern sky with my great-niece and her boyfriend, they walked in the house and i stayed to watch all the aircraft in the area. i live near an airport that is about 3 miles away but, i have never seen it like that night since the 70's. as i watched, a star came from the sky in the southeast looping around toward the front of the building which faces west. it must have been a couple hundred feet off the ground. i ran to the other door. this object was barely more than treetop high and moving very slowly over an area maybe as far as two miles away. i shouted to my niece,'do you wanna see a ufo'. she and her boyfriend came to the door and watched as the craft was spinning and hovering over the treetops. they asked me how far away it was and i said i thought maybe a mile. it started to loop around toward our direction as if searching and then headed north slowly. i was filming with my camera and turned the camera lights on to see if it would make a difference,[i really wanted them to see the light and come to investigate]. my niece and her man ran back in the house screaming,'turn that light off'. laughing, i watched as the craft headed north which took my eyes past the location of this object i am talking about today.It was the brightest object in the sky except for the full moon and from february till now is in relatively the same area of sky. i actually did think it was a star or the new planet everybody is talking about until after posting on facebook about it, i went immediately back to look at it and of course it was gone. this was the around end of march and since then i tried to photograph it many times to no avail till last night. previously, i had found a nice spot and as soon as i turned the camera on the image started to to fade out of view but was still sitting there in my vision as if they knew i was filming. this really made me work a little harder to get these images. my cheap camera doesn't do well in the dark so for this to show up at all is exciting. i have had experience with this sort of stuff all my life and have been an abductee repeatedly since i can remember. i am not concerned about publicity or fame from this, i would just like to see more people come forward without shame. i started telling people about this stuff in the 70's and even my family berated me for telling then. i am sure i will get more tuff words, i can handle it. if you want images, i have a few as, my computer keeps destroying itself and i lose all my stuff.
content.summary: This has been in the same relative position for over 2 months, it is there and in a while may disappear and return. there are other objects around as well as miitary aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I went on a trip to hardy county wv, i guess it was july or august 2005. we were staying with some friends in a cabin style house at the top of a great big hill, very mountainous area.. i was on the back deck about 9pm, soking a ciggarette just star gazing, the air was so clear and your up higher in altitude so the stars were really catching my eye, they were very bright. then i started watching what looked exactly like a star move in a straight line and then begin to change directions in no-time flat, just one second one way...One second the other. it was literally zigzagging in between other stars. i mean at that far away the speed must have been amazing!! about 4 of my friends cae outside and watched also, turns we counted 28 of those things that night. same color as any other star, same size... i mean going completely across the sky at times just to turn around. i had this crazy feeling they we're just doing it to see if anone was paying attention, just a private show for those who were. at times there were 2 or 3 at a time.
content.summary: I wittnessed 28 (over a period of 4 hours). they were zig-zagging through the sky between and around stars as if to catch your attention.

content.detailedDescription: My grandma and brother just got home from late night shopping when they were grabbing the bags the spotted a big star looking thing they told my uncle then he wanted to get a closer look he then grabbed his camara and zoomed in on it when he zoomed in it almost looked like a moon then when it got closer it had like a glow around it bot the outlines were blured we then went inside  and looked at the footage we were all shocked at what we were seeing we went back out side and it looked like it was getting lower we reprorted it to the marysville police department and the police officer looked very scared at the sight of it we went inside and went to sleep for the night and in the mornig it was gone
content.summary: Big star like figure when zommed in look like moon

content.detailedDescription:
At around 18:30 on the 15/4/12 i was sat looking out of 
the window at the clouds. when. i noticed a object appear from behind the clouds .
it was shape like a sphere and seemed to be white and grey in color it moved ever so slowly and then stayed stationary for about 30seconds then began to move again behind a small grey cloud.From my house i was looking south west and as the object moved behind the cloud i also noticed   
a jet airliner traveling north but many thousands of feet higher .
i stood waiting for the object to appear from behind the cloud again but it never came out and as the cloud started to disspurs the object had disappeared and this cloud was not large in diameter.
 i have waited all my life to see something like this and was unable to get a photograph 
which is very disappointing but what i saw i believe was real and like nothing i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Sat on couch looking out of window at clouds when object appeared from behind clouds moving slowly at first then stationary

content.detailedDescription: No eng
content.summary: No eng

content.detailedDescription:
1. during the sighting i was smoking a cigarette outside on a raised terrace in the los angeles neighborhood of silver lake facing e.

2. a large, silent flash of light high above me in the sky caught my attention,after receding it immediately reveled the craft. 

3. i thought the object was an extraterrestrial vessel emerging from a visual field cloaking device and ascending out of earth's atmosphere.

4. after the explosion-like flash of light receded, there was a dark craft with light edges, shaped with rectangular and cube-like protuberances. after hovering briefly, the object began a rapid ascent into the upper atmosphere which lasted very briefly, only 4-5 seconds. the object quickly became a faint point of light in the upper horizon, before disappearing entirely.

5. at the time of the sighting, i felt confused and impressed by how a craft could demonstrate a silent explosion (an impossibility?) as a mechanism for some sort of function, and by comparison, how backwards and simple our earthly technology seemed.

6. after the craft's rapid ascent it disappeared out of earth atmosphere.
content.summary: Ufo appears after silent flash of light and ascends into upper atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: The security camera detects motion and sends a series of photos to my email. i found these photos strange as the light appears to be hovering right over the front of my truck. where the object is over the truck there is a block wall so no light could be coming through from the other side or the road. no one is aware of the camera so i don't feel anyone was playing games with it. i went out and tested it the next night with a mag light to see if i got the same effect. i did not, not near bright enough or large enough. i think this is from something hovering. the road is not in the line of this light either and judging from the series of photos the camera took i do not see any movement that would normally show from the road. there are lights way in the background from other houses but they should be much higher in the photo. they also don't show up this bright or big on the camera. the only other possibility for this photo is a ufo. note: i do believe i used to be abducted as a child and young adult and feel this may be an attempt to keep tabs on me as i did just move to this house two days prior to this sighting. i did not directly observe this but so the witness i refer to in the check box portion of the report is the camera. i was only able to upload 2 photos of the object here. i do have a series of six that show no movement slow enough for the camera to capture. upon speaking to the neighbors they had no traffic in the driveway that morning even near that time.
content.summary: This is a series of photos taken by a security camera mounted on the front of my house. i have included on photo during the daylight hours for comparison..

content.detailedDescription: The security camera detects motion and sends a series of photos to my email. i found these photos strange as the light appears to be hovering right over the front of my truck. where the object is over the truck there is a block wall so no light could be coming through from the other side or the road. no one is aware of the camera so i don't feel anyone was playing games with it. i went out and tested it the next night with a mag light to see if i got the same effect. i did not, not near bright enough or large enough. i think this is from something hovering. the road is not in the line of this light either and judging from the series of photos the camera took i do not see any movement that would normally show from the road. there are lights way in the background from other houses but they should be much higher in the photo. they also don't show up this bright or big on the camera. the only other possibility for this photo is a ufo. note: i do believe i used to be abducted as a child and young adult and feel this may be an attempt to keep tabs on me as i did just move to this house two days prior to this sighting. i did not directly observe this but so the witness i refer to in the check box portion of the report is the camera. i was only able to upload 2 photos of the object here. i do have a series of six that show no movement slow enough for the camera to capture.
content.summary: This is a series of photos taken by a security camera mounted on the front of my house. i have included on photo during the daylight hours for comparison..

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony last night around 10:30 pm, smoking a cigarette, and noticed a small streak of light go across the western sky/horizon, probably above the pines/michigan city area in indiana.  so i watched a waited for more- but noticed something way more awesome!  there were 20+ of these objects scattered in that direction only(west).  they were fast and could stop on a dime, make a 180 turn at high speeds... it was just way out of the ordinary.  last night was cloudy, i couldnt see the stars but i could definitely see these tiny objects chasing each other through the sky. i stood there and watched this for at least 30 minutes, with my mouth hanging wide open and wondering- why isnt anyone else outside right now?! id totally ask them if they saw it too  i was home alone and got a little startled when i thought i saw one of the objects come in my direction... once i saw the mass of the object coming closer and growing- which was like a shadow- i quickly went inside grabbed my keys and left.  that was all i wanted to do with it...So that was the last i saw of it. no et meetings for me, thank you!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A large number of small star-like objects moving quickly in random directions, sometimes following one another at high speeds.

content.detailedDescription: Was traveling south on interstate between billings and hardin, montana.  looked up toward the southeastern sky and saw was at first i thought was a plane, but it looked odd.  the exhaust trail appeared to be going vertical and the trail was fanned out instead of line like you would see if watched a jet go across the sky.  then the exhaust trail dissipated, leaving a glowing starlike orb which moved across the sky to the south/southwest.  i could not tell if it was changing directions or if was the turns in the road that i was driving on that made it appear like it was changing directions.  it appeared to move effortlessly and became smaller and smaller as it got farther away. even as it was in some light clouds i could faintly see it's glow, but eventually disappeared.  i had a smart phone with a photo capabilities, but being on the interstate did not want to pull over for safety reasons and thought i could make it to hardin and still get a photo, but was not able to get there by the time it was gone.  i have spoken to other people who have also seen strange things in the sky in this area.
content.summary: Starlike object that began with a fanned trail going vertical. then fan dissipated and flew horizontal.

content.detailedDescription: Was turning onto mar vista street from la cuarta and when i looked up i saw about 15-20 orange colored objects flying at what appeared at steady speed. i pulled over and got out my car and started staring. other cars passed by and slowed down and i tried to take pictures but they didn't come out well. i kept just observing objects and some flew in odd patterns, two even almost seemed to touch then break away and fly in patterns that planes just arent capable of. i watched until i couldn't see them anymore. after that i called 911 and reported the incident, they told me they had received similar calls right before mine.
content.summary: Group of approx. 15-20 orange colored ufos flying over whittier, ca area

content.detailedDescription: Hi it was june 14 2002 aronud 10:00pm i was living on summit/mt madonna road located in the santa cruz mountain area. elevation 3500ft. i had just lyed down for bed and heard a low rumble and it started getting louder and louder until i sat up in bed to try and see what was going on outside. i had never heard anything like this in all my life. hundreds of small blueish white beams of light began strobing and flashing all around out side of my house. like a thousand flashes of a camera in only ten seconds. i could seem the beams scan around as if under control. my heart is pounding so hard and i feel like i am going into shock at this point. i couldnt comprehend what was happening. the last several beams came through my window and i had a very close look at them, about 15 inches away from my legs. the beams were 10 inches around with a darker blue core and a brighter blueish white outer. like a beam inside a beam is the best i can describe it. i peer out the window and see this 500ft long craft flying directly over head, only 200-300ft above me and traveling in a north east direction very slowly. looking directly up at the craft i could see a huge square red light a dozen smaller white lights in rows around the outter edge in a triangular shape. i know the craft was flying super low because i could now see the rear of the ship. from the rear i could see large circular red lights pulsating from left to right then right to left and so on. slowly disapeared out of sight. the whole incident only lasted 15 minets but when i checked my clock it was 11:59pm. strangly i went calmly to sleep with out getting out of bed to go and check on my 16 year old cousin who was right outside camping in a tent only 25 feet away. i awoke the next morning with no memory of this sighting and neither did my cousin untill later that evening at the exact same instant we both remembered and became so flustered we couldnt find the words to describe what happened we both just knew and tears came out of our eyes for a second. then words came out and he said he saw the exact same thing and even more than i had seen due to the fact he was out in a tent looking straight at it during all the beam flashes. he told me it looked as if it were searching for me and when it found me the beams stopped. we both drew pictures in seperate rooms and compared them both were almost identical. i still have the drawings. i always wanted to tell my people about this incident but i dont want to be called crazy i think hypnotheropy would reviel much more about the two missing hours. i want to know what happened to me that night. are their others with a similar experance.I need answers. thanks for your time
content.summary: A terrifing event that changed my life forever. what ever it was did something to me i can feel it .

content.detailedDescription:
22:35 approx (main sighting). sometimes i ufo-gaze out my front window. thus...

about 21:30 to 22:00 or so, observed first one star-sized object, then about 15 mins later another, much clearer. both seemed to zig-zag and hover in their n-s paths, but i thought the first one might have been a satellite at first because it was mostly obscured by trees. but the second one (which at one point was directly above me relative to the earth) i clearly saw zig-zag and pause in place many times before moving on. as if wanting to make a point that it was not a "normal" object.

so 22:35 came, and i heard what at first i thought sounded like a distant airliner, but the sound became more humming and pulsated abnormally, not like the relatively constant sound of jet engines at all. so i positioned myself to get a clear view, and out from behind a tree came a white orbish thing, but it was so close i could have sworn it had disk-like morphology (it seemed to glow around the edges but was dark in the middle). when the craft was approximately 5-10 degrees west of the star polaris (it was travelling to the north of me, west to east, straight line and no zig-zagging or hovering), the sound stopped altogether - another thing jet engines can't do, at least not if they don't want to fall out of the sky. it got steadily dimmer in approximately a 10 degree arc, until it disappeared from vision altogether, before it passed the tree line.

ain't the first time i've seen weird stuff while ufo-gazing either, but didn't report the other incidents because they were a lot more ambiguous. i do seem to see a lot of weirdly shaped planes which make no sound and hover, as well as helicopters flying with no lights at night, 2 meters above the freaking ground. not bothered to report because as of yet, no completely reliable method to tell holograms from actual human aircraft. i suppose it's worth mentioning i've witnessed and/or accidentally caught on camera at least 7 separate incidences of unidentified objects, and more than one sighting has been unambiguous enough to report to mufon (though i only thought to report the red orb incident).
content.summary: Satellite-like points that zig-zagged and hovered, then orb or disk that cloaked

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a day kayaking on the lochsa river in northern idaho.  it was about 4:00 pm on a unusual(for this time of year!)beautiful day.  blue bird sky's, with popcorn white clouds.  i was driving back to missoula montana, about two hours away, after kayaking the lochsa river. while driving on a very curvy road i spotted a white, disk like object hovering but yet moving at a very slow speed, about 500 ft in the air, one mile ish away from me.  the weird thing was, it, the object remained at a 45 degree angle the entire time.  unlike a plane that were to be banking, it never changed it's angle or course.  also, the object didn't emit any light really, it was just solid white with a darkish strip that seemed to move slightly.  i watched it for quite awhile, at times losing it behind mountains only to see it again.  thought about it intensely, trying to rule out a plane or glider or balloon, but nothing made sense.  this is such a remote location, it's highly unlikely that a balloon or glider would be in the area.  at first thought it was a glider, then after watching it for awhile realize,there is no location for a glider to take off in this remote wilderness.  then realized, this was no glider.  i know this area well. not something you see.....Ever.
content.summary: Not a plane or balloon.  very remote wilderness terrain. mid day, white disk that stayed  stationary at a 45 degree angle for 5 minutes or so.  saw it go through  a cloud, then hover and move on until disappeard behind a mountain.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My daughter arrived at home and came running inside saying there were ufos outside. she and her two friends were standing in the street and pointed out to me a line of objects passing over our house and heading in a rough southwestern direction. they were well above the tree tops; i would estimate them to be about 500 feet above the ground. i had to crane my neck to look up and see them. they said that they saw a large group moving towards them above the main road outside of our neighborhood .

we observed 10-15 noiseless objects that appeared with fuzzy edges and circular shape with an unwavering orange light. our first thought was that there were paper lanterns, but they were traveling very quickly and the evening was mild, clear, with only a light breeze. the light did not flicker as i would expect a paper lantern to and the objects were all traveling in a uniform direction and speed as if on a path. these were obviously new lights and not the ones they had seen on the road. i would estimate they were about 30 to 45 seconds apart. i attempted to film with a phone camera but i do not believe it captured the images due to the lack of light.
content.summary: 6-10 large objects with orange lights travelling in a straight line over a period of 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my familly were driving from florida to new jersey,we missed the exit ,and to go back to rt95 north ,we got on rt 121 north ,the road was dark ,not many cars were passing through.From miles we saw that the sky in front was lighting  up for a moment than stopped.I am an electrical eng. and i am aware of diferent variety of light ,but to me this looked ,much different than anything i have seen before.As we were getting closer to the source of the light,(like 15-20 miles ) to get on rt 10 east,very bright blue white light ,was above the trees ,than i thought that is some kind of light ,maybe from some kind of signalization .But the light was above my car ,so was moving along with my car ,than we realized that the light is not stationery,and was moving along.Mu wife got scared,my kids were asleep on the back seat.This was lasting for 2-3 minutes ,than we saw in the back ,the light stayed behind ,and was flashing .I do not know what was it! than we looked on the internet ,that someone had the same experience ,as we did have,three years ago ,on the same road.Someone was trying to explain ,that there is an airoport and penetentiary ,close by ,and that could be ,an airport light or airplane ,or the prison guard are mapping the area with light ,to check for escaped prisoners.I do not believe any of this ,the light was moving along with our car ,i could not see the shape, because the light was very strong ,and bright white ,sometimes like light blue ,and was sinhronized with the speed of our car. i wil go back again ,but this time alone ,if i was by my self , i was going to stop ,and see what is it,but beeing with two small kids ,i was scare to stop!
content.summary: Strong light ,white or light blue color ,was following our car

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work with my uncle in fleetwood, a very rural area with lots of farms and amish folk.  on my way in, i noticed something about 20 degrees to my right.  it seemed to be a pulsating light, flickering blue, red, green, orange, and a few other colors.  at first i thought it was just a star, but as we drove closer, it appeared to get larger and the flickering colors stopped.  it became a very very bright goldish-white color, and hovered there for a few minutes.  as we became parallel to the light, there appeared to be an extension of the craft that went down a few feet, but unlike the rest of the craft, this part was solid black with a circular light around the bottom of it and was in the shape of a bullet.  as we kept driving, i turned around and continued to watch the craft.  as i neared my work, i noticed the craft had started to travel on a path to the south-south east, where it eventually disappeared from my site over a tree line.

even my uncle, who usually has a sound explanation for almost anything, couldnt figure out what we were looking at.  we were both left unsure, and talked about it for several minutes trying to deduce what it could have been, but still came to no logical conclusion.  it was like nothing we have ever seen before.
content.summary: Pulsating lights breaking into a path

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were walking home from an evening event, we were looking at the constellations and planets, i happened to turn around for no apparent reason and noted 3 circular spheres in a row, i showed my husband and as we were looking at them one separated from the other two and changed the pattern, they continued to fly noiselessly toward port charlotte harbor.  then they were gone from view.  afterwards there were airplanes following their normal flight path, with red/white flashing lights but that is all.  the ufos were silent, and if i didn't "happen" to turn around i would not have seen them.
content.summary: There were 3 ufos, starlike, circular, one separated from the other two

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were walking home from an evening event, we were looking at the constellations and planets, i happened to turn around for no apparent reason and noted 3 circular spheres in a row, i showed my husband and as we were looking at them one separated from the other two and changed the pattern, they continued to fly noiselessly toward port charlotte harbor.  then they were gone from view.  afterwards there were airplanes following their normal flight path, with red/white flashing lights but that is all.  the ufos were silent, and if i didn't "happen" to turn around i would not have seen them.
content.summary: There were 3 ufos, starlike, circular, one separated from the other two

content.detailedDescription:
back in may of 2009 my wife and i saw some unusual things happening in the night skies. it started one night as we were outside, like we did quite often, sitting by a fire pit having coffee and watching the stars. one night in may we were sitting around talking when we saw three bight lights cross the sky and stop for a few seconds and then the three lights shot off in different directions. it actually sent chills up my back and made us feel a little uneasy being outside. the way the lights came streaking across the sky and then all three stopped at the same time, stood still for about 30 seconds and then shot off if three perfectly patterned exit at very high speed.
     it was about a week later, we were sitting outside again on another clear warm night on the 29th.Of may when we saw this. two lights that came from different parts of the western skies over mission, british columbia, canada. the two objects stopped just to the east and just hung there. after being in shock again for a few seconds, i thought i need to try and grab my camera to prove this. it took me roughly a minute, maybe two, to get my camera, a lens and get back outside. much to my amazement the objects were still in the sky. i managed to get these five shots of what we saw. keep in mind, that these two objects were actually small very bright dots, but because i didn't have time to set up a tripod and shot at an iso of 3200 hand held the camera for a 1 sec exposure, the dots look like small lines. these objects, to my surprise showed up on my camera. the stars were very bright that night and were all around these objects but never showed up on the image. gives you an idea of just how bright they were.
     the two objects made very rapid moves changing their location in the sky over roughly this 1 minute 15 second span. but they moved fast, then stopped and then moved again, rather than a drifting motion. after the last image i shot here the two objects, at exactly the same time, seemed to shoot straight up into space at an amazing speed. i have seen a few shooting stars, but these objects were traveling at way faster speeds than that and did not shoot across the sky like a meteor or shooting star, but rather straight up. it was an extremely eerie  feeling. we had some friends see the same thing during that month as well.
     i tried calling the tv news channels to report what i saw, hoping that someone else had seen the same thing but i couldn't find anyone who was really interested, which shocked me. except for those two nights in may of 2009 i haven't seen anything more. i saw a tv show that featured a group called mufon and it made me want to do this letter and send it to them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two bright lights that moved across the sky and stop, changed locations and left at the same time

content.detailedDescription: Driving down 108th to 109th near pullman, michigan witnessed bright lights in western sky (over lake michigan) moving fast north east.  3 lights very bright, moving faster than any jet we've ever seen and making quick zig zag turns then hoovering north of 108th way up in sky but remaining extremely bright.  this occured lated around 10 p.M. watched the bright lights for at least 5 minutes all the way to 109th/i96 n.  this was not an airplane and no helicopter could move this quickly and 3 bright lights entire time.
content.summary: 3 bright lights, moving very fast, changing direction fast & hoovering, remaining very bright after long passed

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the grocery store at 10:30 pm on the 13th of april, 2012. as soon as i turned towards the southwest direction, i saw three very bright lights in the sky in the shape of a perfect triangle, all moving in complete unison. at first the lights remained stationary, as if they were hovering. i had no idea what it was because it was dark and i could not tell. i could not even tell if it was one object or three separate objects moving in unison. the lights were arranged in a triangle with two lights on top, and one light on the bottom in the middle. after about two minutes, the bottom middle light disappeared and the other two lights continued to move in perfect unison. after another couple minutes, they gained speed rapidly and moved south. after about one minute, i lost sight of them due to distance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three bright lights in the shape of a perfect triangle that were pulsating between red and white. one of the lights completely disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Left work, walking home with my partner in the marylebone area (towards great portland street w1), saw what we thought was a star until it started moving, very bright and white like venus, then started changing color, faded into a dim orange/yellow, zig zagged and it was gone! the second one looked like an orb with flashing red/white/yellow/green lights, we tought it was an helicopter but it changed direction way to fast and then we lost sight of it.

the 3rd and 4th were nearer the bt tower, stationary white orbs behind the cloud directly over-head , although one was much brighter then the other (so the 4th could have been a reflection caused by the 3rd) my partner tought it was the moon and was waiting for the break in the cloud to get a better look, unitl it just disappeared like someone switching off a light!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Series of 4 white orbs, star like size, some directional some stationary, very bright

content.detailedDescription: I was waking home from my grandmothers place at or around 11:30 pm, it was cloudy where i can't even see the moon, and my house was only seven houses up the street, i was walking while looking down on the road i'm walking on, then all of a sudden, i saw my shadow in an enclosed circle of blue light, i looked up, and saw this light as big as a basket ball then slowly going upwards until it disappeared, this seem to last only a few seconds, but in fact it was actually two and a half hours, because by the time i reached home, everyone was sleeping, i was surprised to see everyone asleep already, i looked at the clock and was surprised to see the time is 2 am,....I have no recollection of the 2 1/2 hours that passed.
content.summary: Blue beam of light

content.detailedDescription: During dinner hour a family member witnessed a light in the sky from the kitchen window and called me to look.  the sky was dark as the sun had already set.  facing east i observed a red-orange glowing orb or fireball above the rooftops.  the object moved slowly and horizontally across the sky from south to north.  two family members witnessed the same event.  distance was difficult to judge, possibly a few miles away.  at first i thought it was an airplane or helicopter but it did not have the typical blinking lights of an aircraft.  i thought it could also be a meteor but i have never positively identified a meteor before and the path the ufo traveled seemed inconsistent with a meteor.  during this time i could recognize aircraft in the distance in the same field of view as the ufo.  after a short time observing, the orb stopped along its path and hovered.  i thought to take a photograph but then the glow ceased and the object became star-like after which it disappeared into the distance.  it was no longer visible and did not reappear.  the entire event lasted not more than 3 minutes, possibly even less than 1 minute.
content.summary: Slow moving red glowing orb observed on an aerial path, hovered, then extinguished.

content.detailedDescription: This was never seen by my wife and i but i noticed the object in this picture a few years ago! i take many pictures!
content.summary: Photo taken with 35 mm film in hawaii

content.detailedDescription: Traveling from clear fork road in rowan county, ky onto cranston road and then onto us 32 towards home (a 40 minute drive) i observed a set of three lights shaped like a football on its end. the top light and bottom light were about a fourth the size of the middle light and were red and randomly blinking (i believe they were randomly blinking but i was driving and unable to watch the object continuously until i reached home.) the middle white light was longer and vertical. when i was about four miles past morehead i was able to see the sky unobstructed. i noticed it because it appeared huge compared to flying planes in the sky. i had seen on the news that the international space station was visible the night before so at first i thought it must be that. however, i realized the description was just a round white light of the iss and this was not at all round or just white. it was probably 25 times the size of a normal airplane flying in the sky and at first was stationary. as i traveled northwest it appeared in the sw sky and was not visible unless i looked behind me but several times it appeared in front of me. as this could have been because of the twists and turns in the road i find it hard to believe it remained stationary the whole time. us 32 is not extremely curvy therefore, i decided it must have moved west at some points during my drive. the white light did not blink. i was amazed that this was so large and kept appearing in front of me. i was quite mesmerized by it and felt like i was seeing something quite unique and special. i would have stopped to look at it but i was extremely tired from working 12 hours and honestly wondered if my eyes were playing tricks on me. i do not believe my eyes would have seen this from being tired for a full 40 minutes. when i reached home, it appeared to be farther away and maybe higher in the sky. i watched outside for a few minutes and did not see it move. while i was watching i saw a plane(?) or some other object with white and a red light in the configuration of a normal airplane appear to hover beside it. however, when i went to my bedroom about to lie down for the night about 20 minutes later, i noticed it still in the sky in the same area. i decided i wanted to take a picture of it with my cellphone and turned my tv and my light off. when i tried to get it in my viewfinder, it suddenly descended below the tree level. it may have landed somewhere. it went from being above the treetops to almost on the horizon within seconds. i looked for it for about 10-15 minutes and saw the white light through the trees but not enough to see continuously. as i live in a rural area and do not normally see a light at this level, i feel it may have been the light still shining. finally, i could not see the light anymore at all.
content.summary: Football shaped set of three lights seemed stationary in sw sky but reappeared continuously in front of me during 40 minute drive

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:00 pm, i was in my driveway near the corner of lone star trail and briarglen drive having a cigarette, facing se, and saw a craft just a couple of blocks away, approximately following menlow drive (which is the next street to the east) from north to south, just above the trees on the east side of the street.  it looked as big as a 747!  i watched in amazement as the object continued south-southwest and crossed briarglen drive.  as it went over the houses and trees there it began to descent sort of to the southeast towards the lake, and i lost sight of it.  it was elongated with 5 to 8 amber-colored lights located horizontally along the midline of the craft.
content.summary: I was in my driveway having a cigarette and noticed a lighted object moving southward above a neighboring street.

content.detailedDescription: I was in herman park with my mother and my dog  then i was taking pictures when i took the second picture apear the strange object. there was a diference of time of time of 4 seconds betwen the first an the second picture.
content.summary: I was in herman park with my mother and my dog  then i was taking pictures when i took the second picture apear the strange object

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch on friday night, looking up toward the north around 10:30.  i saw what appeared to be a shooting star that moved slowly downward at about a 45 degree angle.  it neared 2 stars and stopped for a second.  it then went back up in unison with one other star and faded away.
content.summary: Shooting star dropped, slowed, then went up in unison with another star.
